verses.name: Exodus 36:21
verses.text: The length of a board was ten cubits, and the breadth of a board one cubit and a half.

verses.name: Exodus 36:22
verses.text: One board had two tenons, equally distant one from another: thus did he make for all the boards of the tabernacle.

verses.name: Exodus 36:23
verses.text: And he made boards for the tabernacle; twenty boards for the south side southward:

verses.name: Exodus 36:24
verses.text: And forty sockets of silver he made under the twenty boards; two sockets under one board for his two tenons, and two sockets under another board for his two tenons.
